survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Transformation Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with recent digital transformation initiatives within the organization.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the digital transformation initiatives implemented in your department?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the digital transformation initiatives implemented in your department?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital tools have you used as part of the transformation initiatives? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Cloud-based collaboration platforms (e.g., Microsoft 365, Google Workspace)
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection to allow multiple answers.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital tools have you used as part of the transformation initiatives? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Cloud-based collaboration platforms (e.g., Microsoft 365, Google Workspace)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the training provided for the new digital tools?
